name: New Horizons Aviation, Inc.
about: New Horizons Aviation, Inc., located at Goshen Municipal Airport, is a professional flight school offering comprehensive flight training for various certifications, including Private, Instrument, Commercial, CFI, CFII, and Multi-engine. As an FAA-approved Part 141 school, we provide high-quality instruction with a fleet that includes Cessna 152s, Cessna 172s, a Diamond Star DA-40, a Piper Cherokee, and a Redbird Full-Motion Simulator. Our instructors are experienced and dedicated to ensuring a smooth transition to advanced avionics like the Garmin G1000. We cater to both career-oriented students and hobbyists, with flexible scheduling and competitive rental rates. New Horizons Aviation is committed to safety, proficiency, and making your flying dreams a reality.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
